c:atomType.name: ColorScaleType
c:atomType.c:documentation: The type of color scale for continuous color axes.

c:atom.name: Linear
c:atom.c:documentation: A linear scale is used to map a numeric domain into a color range.

c:atom.name: Discrete
c:atom.c:documentation:
A discrete scale is used.
The numeric domain is quantized and then mapped to a discrete number of colors.

c:atom.name: Normal
c:atom.c:documentation:
A normal distribution scale is used.
This scale type is currently unsupported.
